locale.resource:
{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252\cocoartf949\cocoasubrtf540 {\fonttbl\f0\fnil\fcharset0 LucidaGrande;} {\colortbl;\red255\green255\blue255;\red255\green9\blue0;} \pard\tx560\tx1120\tx1680\tx2240\tx2800\tx3360\tx3920\tx4480\tx5040\tx5600\tx6160\tx6720\ql\qnatural\pardirnatural
\f0\fs26 \cf0 \ This pkg will uninstall MacRuby from your system ( \b all versions! \b0 )\ \ The following files will be removed:\ \ * MacRuby frameworks (/Library/Frameworks/MacRuby.framework)\ * MacRuby symbolic links from /usr/local/bin\ * Developer Examples from /Developer/Examples/Ruby/MacRuby\ * XCode Templates\ \
\b The uninstaller creates a backup of all the files in /tmp/MacRuby_Uninstaller_Backup_DATE\
\b0 \ See http://stackoverflow.com/questions/1146742/uninstall-macruby on how to do it manually.\ \
\b \cf2 USE AT YOUR OWN RISK}

requirement.message: MacRuby is not installed in this system. Nothing to be done :D
Not enough space on the target. Free some space before using the MacRuby Uninstaller.
